props.Name: Kamil
props.Description: Numerous sects exist in the east, thriving on religious tolerance and general chaos, ensnaring the eager minds with in zealotry and tempting the ambitious with power.

props.Name: Ayrynn
props.Description: Skywrath mage in a skirt, doesn't she shine? Check out those coins if still in doubt.

props.Name: Sir Marcus
props.Lore: Despite their small numbers and lack of interest in the world's affairs, Skyguard knights are still feared enough so that few ever dare cross the borders of Eagle Realm with steel in hand.
props.Description: A perfect Knight that fights with Honor. Hardly as efficient as a hired thug or a brawling dwarf, but you get to be a good person in the end.

props.Name: Ravenna
props.Quick_Items: Cheap Poison Coating;Inferior Copper Knife;Minor Essence Potion;

props.Name: Imros the Rangerly
props.Quick_Items: Inferior Palewood Elven Arrows;Inferior Steel Arrows;Minor Healing Potion;

props.Name: Adrian v2
props.Jewelry: Minor Bone Ring of N Of Counters(+1);Minor Possessed Ring of Resistance Penetration(+10);Minor Bracer of Attack(+12);Minor Signet of Defense(+10);
props.Skills: Greater Strength;Cold Blood;Power Strike;Combat Caster;Practiced Spellcaster;Spellcasting Improvisation;Cleave;
props.Quick_Items: Minor Healing Potion;Minor Stamina Potion;Minor Fortifying Potion;

props.Name: Zak v3
props.Quick_Items: Cheap Levitation Elixir;Minor Essence Potion;Minor Fortifying Potion;Minor Catalyst Potion;Minor Focus Potion;
props.Description: There are many who aren't content with the lack of privileges for the "High Race" in the Allkingdom and the passive subservient attitude of the ruling Eagle Lords.

props.Name: Raven Realm Mercenary
props.Description: In a realm dominated by underworld magi guilds, those without magical education often seek to prove themselves invaluable as discrete and determined wizard killers.
props.Deity: Warmaster;Witch King;Night Lord;Underking;Crimson Queen;Lord of Decay;Keeper of Twilight;Dark Gods;

props.Name: Eagle Realm Skyguard
props.Lore: Despite their small numbers and lack of interest in the world's affairs, Skyguard knights are still feared enough so that few ever dare cross the borders of Eagle Realm with steel in hand.
props.Description: A perfect Knight that fights with Honor. Hardly as efficient as a hired thug or a brawling dwarf, but you get to be a good person in the end.

props.Name: Easterling Wanderer
props.Description: In the Eastern Realms, those who do not wish to associate themselves with any of the cults often choose to flee into the West.
props.Deity: Sun God;Death Gorger;World Tree;Queen of Lust;Annihilator;Lord of Decay;Wild God;Warmaster;World Tree;Allfather;Sky Queen;Night Lord;Crimson Queen;Arachnia;Dark Gods;Fide Arcanum;

props.Name: Nordheim Slayer
props.Description: Slayers are an elite caste in Nordheim society, charged with the destruction of giants, goblinoids and drakes that roam the Great Wilderness.
